entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:48 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 07:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or freezing drizzle near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
